newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Plains fed cattle $63, slow/moderate-feedlots.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Plains fed cattle $63, slow/moderate-feedlots.

text.p: U.S. Plains feedlot cattle sold at $63.00 per cwt in slow to moderate activity Tuesday, feedlot sources and USDA said. The sales were steady with last week's trade.

About 21,600 head sold in the Texas Panhandle and western Oklahoma area, which brought the week to date figure to 44,600 including 20,100 formulated and 1,200 contracted cattle to be shipped this week, USDA said.
In Kansas, 8,800 head sold, with 16,800 confirmed for the week to date including 3,700 previously contracted or formulated cattle, USDA said.
